thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com | 8 of 62
thread.title: Sgt. Zteff

author: Sgt. Zteff
title: Sgt. Zteff
text:
Bought a template for a new version of a web, really nice layout and good code. After designing the new web we soon realized something was wrong, it stalled for like 30-40 seconds when loading, didn't matter what platform, tried it locally on Apache, samesame.
After pulling some hair I contacted Monster online, and after some back and forth and a few capital letters I was connected to Tyler, who swiftly nailed the problem and cooked up a remedy! Nice work there Tyler!
